Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Shell
Description: Substantial, perfectly preserved shell pierced at both extremities. Because of these two holes, it is presumed that this shell was part of a necklace, where it would have been a characteristic central element. It is shiny and speckled, as well as naturally glazed by touch.
